Class DiagonalMatrixStorage<E>

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.mathematics.linearalgebra.matrices.storage.DiagonalMatrixStorage<E>
All Implemented Interfaces:
MatrixStorage<E>
public class DiagonalMatrixStorage<E> extends Object implements MatrixStorage<E>
Diagonal matrix storage - only stores diagonal elements.

Provides O(n) storage instead of O(nÃ‚Â²) for diagonal matrices.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
